instruction: Claim daily quest reward from https://web3game.xyz/api/quest/daily.
input:
[POST] https://web3game.xyz/api/quest/daily
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <access_token>
Content-Type: application/json
Body: {"action": "claim"}

instruction: Swap 0.5 ETH to USDT on Uniswap using WalletConnect.
input:
[SWAP] Protocol: Uniswap
From: ETH
To: USDT
Amount: 0.5
Method: WalletConnect

instruction: Sign and send a transaction to stake 100 $TOKEN to the staking contract at 0xABC123...
input:
[CONTRACT_CALL] Method: stake
To: 0xABC123...
Token: $TOKEN
Amount: 100
Signer: injected/metamask

instruction: Check if wallet 0x1234... has already claimed the airdrop on https://airdrop.dapp.xyz/api/check.
input:
[GET] https://airdrop.dapp.xyz/api/check?address=0x1234...
Headers:
Accept: application/json

instruction: Claim NFT reward from https://gamefi-portal.com/rewards with user token.
input:
[POST] https://gamefi-portal.com/rewards
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <user_token>
Body: {"type": "nft", "action": "claim"}

instruction: Trigger harvest on yield farm contract at 0xDEF456 using connected wallet.
input:
[CONTRACT_CALL] Method: harvest
Contract: 0xDEF456
Network: BNB Chain
Gas: auto

instruction: Approve spending of 500 USDC to PancakeSwap router on BSC.
input:
[ERC20_APPROVE] Token: USDC
Spender: 0xRouterAddress
Amount: 500
Network: BSC

instruction: Interact with quest board to complete mission ID 873 on https://play.questverse.io/api/mission.
input:
[POST] https://play.questverse.io/api/mission
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <session_token>
Body: {"mission_id": 873, "status": "complete"}

instruction: Send a transaction to bridge 50 MATIC from Polygon to Arbitrum via official bridge API.
input:
[BRIDGE] Token: MATIC
Amount: 50
From: Polygon
To: Arbitrum
Method: Official Bridge API

instruction: Get the current gas fee estimate for Ethereum mainnet.
input:
[GET] https://ethgasstation.info/api/ethgasAPI.json
Response: gasPrice, safeLow, fast

instruction: Claim daily login reward from the game's API.
input:
[POST] https://api.web3game.xyz/reward/daily
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <access_token>
Content-Type: application/json
Body: {"action": "claim"}

instruction: Submit mission ID 453 as completed using session token.
input:
[POST] https://game.questchain.io/api/mission/complete
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <session_token>
Content-Type: application/json
Body: {"mission_id": 453}

instruction: Harvest farmed items from plot ID 12 in Web3 farming game.
input:
[POST] https://farm.web3land.io/api/harvest
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <token>
Body: {"plot_id": 12}

instruction: Claim staking reward for NFT ID 10234 in game vault.
input:
[GET] https://nftvault.gameverse.io/reward?token_id=10234
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <wallet_token>

instruction: Check quest status for user in GameFi quest system.
input:
[GET] https://gamefi.quest/api/status
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <user_token>

instruction: Trigger PvE battle in dungeon level 5 using hero ID 998.
input:
[POST] https://battle.cryptoraiders.io/api/start
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <auth_token>
Body: {"hero_id": 998, "level": 5}

instruction: Upgrade building ID 88 to level 3 in Web3 base-building game.
input:
[POST] https://basebuilder.dapp.io/api/upgrade
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <access_token>
Body: {"building_id": 88, "target_level": 3}

instruction: Join weekly tournament in blockchain strategy game.
input:
[POST] https://tournament.chainwar.io/api/join
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <player_token>
Body: {"event": "weekly", "type": "solo"}

instruction: Buy item ID 147 from in-game marketplace.
input:
[POST] https://marketplace.gamedapp.com/api/buy
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <token>
Body: {"item_id": 147}

instruction: Equip sword ID 554 on hero ID 77 in RPG Web3 game.
input:
[POST] https://rpg.heroverse.app/api/equip
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <token>
Body: {"hero_id": 77, "item_id": 554, "slot": "weapon"}

instruction: Join the project's Telegram group via bot API.
input:
[POST] https://api.airdropbot.io/telegram/join
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <access_token>
Body: {"group_link": "https://t.me/project_official"}

instruction: Follow the project on Twitter using Twitter API.
input:
[POST] https://api.twitter.com/2/users/<your_id>/following
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <twitter_token>
Body: {"target_user_id": "1234567890"}

instruction: Submit wallet address to airdrop form.
input:
[POST] https://airdropform.com/api/submit
Headers:
Content-Type: application/json
Body: {"wallet": "0xabc123...", "campaign": "XYZ_Airdrop"}

instruction: Complete retweet task for airdrop.
input:
[POST] https://api.twitter.com/2/tweets/<tweet_id>/retweet
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <twitter_token>
Body: {"user_id": "<your_id>"}

instruction: Claim token reward after completing airdrop tasks.
input:
[GET] https://claim.airdrophub.io/api/claim?wallet=0xabc123...
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <token>

instruction: Verify email for airdrop account.
input:
[POST] https://airdropportal.io/api/verify-email
Headers:
Content-Type: application/json
Body: {"email": "user@example.com", "code": "123456"}

instruction: Connect wallet to airdrop dashboard.
input:
[POST] https://airdropconnect.xyz/api/wallet-link
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <session_token>
Body: {"wallet": "0xabc..."}

instruction: Check airdrop status for the connected wallet.
input:
[GET] https://status.airdroplab.io/check?wallet=0xabc123...
Headers:
accept: application/json

instruction: Register new user to airdrop system.
input:
[POST] https://register.airdropapi.com/api/signup
Headers:
Content-Type: application/json
Body: {"email": "airdrop@example.com", "wallet": "0xabc..."}

instruction: Submit referral code to get extra airdrop points.
input:
[POST] https://referral.airdropmania.io/api/submit
Headers:
Authorization: Bearer <user_token>
Body: {"ref_code": "XYZ123"}

instruction: Send a POST request to https://api.hipoverse.xyz/functions/v1/api/tasks/daily with a JSON body containing the taskid 7131c01d-1629-4060-bc84-6b3d415d7ccc and set the Content-Type header to application/json.
